events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and initial review shows relevant skills.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's background in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate's process to ensure smooth communication and follow-ups.
Completed initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles.
Received positive response from candidate confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
